did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: First sermon delivered on December 13, 1850 by Van Arsdale at the Reformed Church of Tyre.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: First sermon delivered on December 13, 1850 by Van Arsdale at the Reformed Church of Tyre, where he served from 1850-1864. Discusses the obligations of the church to their pastor.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Reformed Church in America -- New York (State) -- Tyre.

controlaccess.head: Places:
controlaccess.geogname: Seneca County (N.Y.) -- Religious life and customs.
